directions: Mix pineapple juice, light rum, cream of coconut, and pink lemonade concentrate together in a large freezer-safe container.
Freeze pineapple mixture until icy and slushy, 4 to 6 hours.
Fill a glass halfway with slushy mixture and top off with lemon-lime soda to serve.
ingredients: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen pink lemonade concentrate
title: Pink Pina Colada Slush
